summary: Frontend testing completed for CallClub - Football prediction site. All core features working correctly: login with authorized users (Mario, Marcos), predictions page with round dropdown (1-6), finished matches showing results and points, rankings page with General and Per Round tabs.
seed_data_creation: None - using existing data from TheSportsDB API
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 features tested and working: 1) Login with authorized names (Mario, Marcos) - PASS, 2) Predictions page round dropdown shows rounds 1-6 - PASS, 3) Predictions page shows matches for selected round - PASS, 4) Finished matches show 'Resultado Final' and points - PASS, 5) Rankings General tab shows classification with total points (Marcos 16pts, Mario 15pts) - PASS, 6) Rankings Per Round tab allows round selection and shows ranking - PASS, 7) Scoring system working correctly (3pts result + 1pt home + 1pt away = 5pts max) - PASS
